page.title: 09KILMERSDON AREA EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
UNEMPLOYMENT,EMPLOYMENT,VOLUNTARY WORK
Many still work on local farms and school leavers manage to get jobs on them, but there is some youth unemployment. Adult unemployment is not a serious problem and a number of people are self-employed. These include a wide range of occupations from stone-mason, accountant, solicitor, estate agent, publican, garage prop., plumbers, etc. Most women look after their homes although some have part-time employment locally. To summarise there is work in Kilmersdon but increasingly as new people move into the surrounding areas more commute to Bath and Bristol. A considerable amount of voluntary work is carried out by the community.
